title: Rihanna Just Unveiled the First Fenty Beauty Products
text: These highlighters are 🔥🔥🔥 Hot on the heels of the first ad for Rihanna's new cosmetics line Fenty Beauty, the "Diamonds" singer has revealed the first products on Instagram. And they do not disappoint. Fenty Beauty's Sept. 8 release date is fast approaching, and the singer has showcased three products so far. The first is called Trophy Wife, and looks like a gorgeous yellow gold eyeshadow. The next photo is of a Highlighter Duo, with shades called Ginger Binge and Moscow Mule. Needless to say, the new range looks totally flawless, and there are bound to be many more products on the way. Amy Mackelden is a freelance writer, editor, and disability activist. Her bylines include Harper's BAZAAR, Nicki Swift, Cosmopolitan, Marie Claire, ELLE, The Independent, Bustle, Healthline, and HelloGiggles.
